tool_description: Collects comprehensive geographic and demographic data for a specified location including terrain elevation, population density, land use, and physical obstacles that could affect network deployment.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

data_resolution.description: Data resolution level: low, medium, high

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid radius: Radius must be between 0.1 and 50 kilometers.
Unsupported resolution: Use low, medium, or high for data_resolution.
Data unavailable: Geographic data not available for the specified location.
usage: Provide latitude, longitude, and radius_km for the area of interest. Optionally specify data_resolution for detail level. Returns comprehensive geographic data for the specified area.

land_use_types.description: Types of land use in the area (residential, commercial, industrial, etc.)

obstacles_count.description: Number of significant physical obstacles (buildings, hills, etc.)
